subject_terms_3: Bose, Subhas Chandra Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
creator_2: Lt. K. E. Kochunni Nair, I. N. A. (?)
physical_appearance: This is an article from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly' published on 14 July 1946. The title is printed at the top-center of the page. There is an excerpt of the article printed in the center.  This article features four photographs of the Indian National Army. The edges of the clipping is slightly torn, especially at the corners. The two-paged article is bound together by a tape in the center along the spine of the publication.
sgcool_label_text: "Prior to the World War II period, Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political, sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions, inspired by the ""call for freedom"" in India
title_text: The Orient The Story of The Indian Independence Movement in East Asia
